userStories.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?

condition.description: Vitamin D helps your body absorb the calcium in your diet. Therefore, vitamin D plays an important role in strong and healthy bones. Low vitamin D, or vitamin D defiency, can lead to low bone mineral density and cause osteoporosis in adults or rickets in children. You can get vitamin D from sun exposure, food (such as fatty fish and milk), or supplements.
indications: vitamin d deficiency prevention for hiv
condition.name: Vitamin D deficiency

indications: Vitamin D deficiency prevention for HIV

carousel_items: Call your doctor if you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain, headache or sleepiness.
Don't take other forms of vitamin D unless told to by your doctor.
Make sure to take at least 600 to 1200 mg of calcium per day.
Some forms of this medication are taken only once a week, others are taken once a day. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist if you're not sure.

basics.benefits_moa: Vitamin D2 is a form of Vitamin D. It raises Vitamin D levels in your blood. This in turn raises calcium levels in your blood by helping you absorb more calcium from food in your intestine.
basics.bottom_line: Vitamin D2 works for vitamin D deficiencies and is available over the counter, but your body doesn't absorb it as well as Vitamin D3.
downsides: Your body doesn't absorb Vitamin D2 as well as Vitamin D3.

downsides_processed.orig: Your body doesn't absorb Vitamin D2 as well as Vitamin D3.

upsides: Available in generic and over the counter.
This is the plant-based version of vitamin D, so it's useful for vegetarians.
Available in oral solution, tablet and capsules.
You can take this as a once a day or once a week medication.

upsides_processed.orig: Available in generic and over the counter.
This is the plant-based version of vitamin D, so it's useful for vegetarians.
Available in oral solution, tablet and capsules.
You can take this as a once a day or once a week medication.

drugs.name: Vitamin D2

labeled_indications.indication: Familial x-linked hypophosphatemic vitamin D refractory rickets

carousel_items_processed.orig: Call your doctor if you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain, headache or sleepiness.
Don't take other forms of vitamin D unless told to by your doctor.
Make sure to take at least 600 to 1200 mg of calcium per day.
Some forms of this medication are taken only once a week, others are taken once a day. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist if you're not sure.

risks_warnings.title: High calcium in the blood
risks_warnings.description: People on Vitamin D2 who take more than the recommended dose can have high calcium in the blood, which can be dangerous in the kidneys. If you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain or a bad headache, talk to your doctor. Keep the amount of calcium you eat the same from day to day.

description_processed.orig: People on Vitamin D2 who take more than the recommended dose can have high calcium in the blood, which can be dangerous in the kidneys. If you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain or a bad headache, talk to your doctor. Keep the amount of calcium you eat the same from day to day.

risks_warnings.title: High calcium in the blood
risks_warnings.description: People on Vitamin D2 who take more than the recommended dose can have high calcium in the blood, which can be dangerous in the kidneys. If you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain or a bad headache, talk to your doctor. Keep the amount of calcium you eat the same from day to day.

description_processed.orig: People on Vitamin D2 who take more than the recommended dose can have high calcium in the blood, which can be dangerous in the kidneys. If you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain or a bad headache, talk to your doctor. Keep the amount of calcium you eat the same from day to day.

carousel_items: Don't take other forms of vitamin D unless your doctor tells you to.
Make sure to take at least 600 to 1200 mg of calcium per day.
Call your doctor if you notice a metallic taste in your mouth, muscle or joint pain, headache or sleepiness.
If you're using the drops, you can place it directly into the mouth, or mix with food, water or juice.
If you're using the spray, spray it under the tongue.

basics.benefits_moa: Vitamin D3 is a form of Vitamin D. It raises Vitamin D levels in your blood. This in turn raises calcium levels in your blood by helping you absorb more calcium from food in your intestine.
basics.bottom_line: Vitamin D3 works well for vitamin D deficiencies and is available over the counter. It absorbs better than vitamin D2, but it's animal-based so vegetarians and vegans might not want to take it.
downsides: This is an animal-based version of vitamin D, so vegetarians and vegans may not be comfortable with taking this supplement.

downsides_processed.orig: This is an animal-based version of vitamin D, so vegetarians and vegans may not be comfortable with taking this supplement.

upsides: Available in generic and over the counter.
Available in oral solution, tablet, and capsules.
You can take it as a once-a-day or once-a-week medication.
This version of vitamin D is better absorbed by the body than vitamin D2.

upsides_processed.orig: Available in generic and over the counter.
Available in oral solution, tablet, and capsules.
You can take it as a once-a-day or once-a-week medication.
This version of vitamin D is better absorbed by the body than vitamin D2.

userStories.tip: Had no idea I was suffering from low vitamin D until a routine blood test revealed it. Taking it restored my energy level and improved mood followed. Big change in about 2 months. Taken with food. (An under-appreciated supplement).
